author: hwright
msg: Factor the history searching code out of the do_logs() function.  This
is preparatory to creating a special-purpose version of do_logs() for use
(get_path_histories): New function.  Largely taken from do_logs().
(do_logs): Call get_path_histories() in place of the factored out code.

author: glasser
msg: First step towards storing revprops in sqlite3.  This revision stores
revprops in sqlite (as well as in the current format) for FSFS only,
and never reads from the database.
(svn_fs_fs_hotcopy): Copy the revprop DB as well.

author: glasser
msg: Created a new branch for experimental work towards storing revision

author: hwright
msg: JavaHL: Update logMessages() API to include omitLogText parameters.
Add omitLogText parameter, pass it to the SVNClient object.
(logMessages): Add omitLogText parameter, and use its value, instead of
defaulting to false, when calling svn_client_log4().

author: hwright
msg: Followup to r25346.  Link to the 1.4.4 announcement.
